actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to make alien crewmen, serving on board a fishing vessel having its home port or operating base in the United States, non-immigrant aliens while they are temporarily in Guam, the Northern Mariana Islands or American Samoa.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to make alien crewmen, serving onboard a fishing vessel having its home port or operating base in the United States, nonimmigrant aliens while they are temporarily in Guam, the Northern Mariana Islands, or American Samoa.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to make alien crewmen, serving on board a fishing vessel having its home port or operating base in the United States, non-immigrant aliens while they are temporarily in Guam, the Northern Mariana Islands or American Samoa.
